summary_teim: Conclusion of the collaborative performance between U2 and Bruce Springsteen. Followed by the unedited induction and performance of R.E.M.
summary_ssm: Conclusion of the collaborative performance between U2 and Bruce Springsteen. Followed by the unedited induction and performance of R.E.M.
contents_teim: U2 and Bruce Springsteen perform I still haven’t found what I’m looking for -- Montage of R.E.M.’s career --Eddie Vedder inducts R.E.M. --R.E.M. accepts award --R.E.M. performs Begin the begin --R.E.M. performs Gardening at night -- R.E.M. and Eddie Vedder perform Man on the moon -- Patti Smith and R.E.M. perform I wanna be your dog -- Inductees perform People have the power
contents_ssm: U2 and Bruce Springsteen perform I still haven’t found what I’m looking for -- Montage of R.E.M.’s career --Eddie Vedder inducts R.E.M. --R.E.M. accepts award --R.E.M. performs Begin the begin --R.E.M. performs Gardening at night -- R.E.M. and Eddie Vedder perform Man on the moon -- Patti Smith and R.E.M. perform I wanna be your dog -- Inductees perform People have the power

abstract_ssm: At 2007 Induction Ceremony -- Second half of video of "Classic Performance" from 2005 Induction Ceremony: I Still Haven't Found what I'm Looking For (U2 with Bruce Springsteen) -- Video Montage of R.E.M.-- Eddie Vedder inducts R.E.M. -- Members of R.E.M. accept their awards -- Begin the Begin; Gardening at Night (R.E.M.) -- Man on the Moon (R.E.M. with Eddie Vedder) -- I Wanna be your Dog (R.E.M. and Patti Smith) -- People have the Power (Patti Smith, Aretha Franklin, R.E.M., Ronnie Spector, Keith Richards,, Paul Shaffer, Eddie Vedder, Grandmaster Flash, Sammy Hagar, and Stephen Stills) -- Video montage of night's highlights: Be My Baby (The Ronettes) Don't Play That Song for Me (Aretha Franklin) Rock n' Roll Nigger (Patti Smith) Why Can't This Be Love (Van Halen) White Lines (Grandmaster Flash and the Furious Five) Ain't Talkin' 'Bout Love (Velvet Revolver) Man on the Moon (R.E.M.) People have the Power (Patti Smith, et al)
